t: Amazon buys land in Kapolei for distribution warehouse | Business | kitv.com

t: Amazon purchases land on Oahu for Hawaii’s first distribution center | KHON2
s: June 29, 2021 - Amazon now owns the 14-acre stretch of land on Auiki Street, and it’s worth more than $76 million. The company says this investment will help with future network needs. According to The Chamber of Commerce Hawaii, a global brand coming to Hawaii means more commerce, economic activity and jobs.
